title: Phytoplasmas of grapevine: molecular diversity of Slovenian strains and new diagnostic challenges

author: Nataša Mehle, Department of Biotechnology and Systems Biology, National Institute of Biology

segmentation: Good afternoon, I'm from National Institute of Biology.
And today I represent you.

Our study on phytoplasma's that cause disease on Grapevine in first part of my talk I will talk about molecular diversity of Slovenia strength and then in the second part about the new diagnostic methods.
Fight the plasmas are cell wall less ground positive bacteria of the class mollicutes and both their salanga norms sysdata smallest among bacteria.
They are obligate intracellular parasites, which are generally restricted to the flu and civil amounts of infected plants.
They are transmitted by flying, feeding leafhoppers, planthoppers and fillets and by the majority of daughter specious, specious, micropropagation grafting, and cuttings.
PHYTOPLASMA scores more than thousand disease on wild and cultivated plants.
On grape on fight, the plasmas are associated with a severe and worldwide disease complex of Grapevine yellows.

Great one yellows are caused by several different taxonomically unrelated fighter plasmas, which is also different vectors, but they cause more or less similar symptoms on grey price like Lee Flooring calling on and reddening or yellowing of the leaves.
During the official survey conducted by the fetus in Italian ministration of Slovenia since 2001, one we found that the most widespread Grapevine yellows phytoplasma in Slovenia is candidate Aceto.
Plasma soloni, the causal agent of 1 war.
In 2005, we first detect alsoft level cindery phytoplasma, which caused the most serious serious disease on great price.
And some individual plants in Slovenia are also infected with candidatus into plasma asteris.
To get more information about the pieology of those Grapevine yellows phytoplasma's, we studied the molecular diversity of two most prevalent fighter plasmas in Sylvania.
And the isolates of 1 warfighter plasmas were subject to characterization by elephant P to investigate two different nonribosomal gene.
Tooth, which encodes allocation factor 2 and VMP one which encodes a protective membrane protein.
The elephant P analyzes of the two gene revealed that in Slovenia we have two types of one or two, A and 2B.
Based on the data in the literature, 2A is many times found also in other battles.
Host booty cardiaca, while 2B was found several times in Calvin View Services.
The gene VMP one showed high polymorphism by FLP because we observed that insulin that's Vinny and one or isolates have 14 different profiles of this gene, but we still don't know if this different.
Profiles have the same or different host Rangers and Epidemiology.
All of Slovenian one or isolate that we character size.
They are have so 2A or 2B and in Slovenia we have 20% which type 2A and 80% with type 2B.
With only one exception, all 2A type of one or phytoplasma have the same VMP 1 profile while 2B is much more divergent in this VMP 1 gene.
We also studied the molecular diversity of lava cindery phytoplasma.
Um oil plants.

Grapevine plants which were infected with virus in Dory when was characterized and we've observed that most of great ones in Slovenia and infected with every D strain, 12% of great brands are infected with FDC strain and 2% of grey pants are infected with other every strain or with a mix of different every strength.
We tested also several other potential reserve specious, and with this testing confirmed the presence of FDC in several Clematis St. Alba plants and in four or five positive island to santisima one.
I learn to self esteem are infected with every D strain and while several others.
But he knows that an honest incarna plants were affected with a mix of different FD strength.
Similar results were awesome.
Time for from other countries.
The main viktorova cindery is copied to Stephanos Squidoo.
Stephanos can efficiently spread Phytoplasma FD between great price.
And in the past it was assumed that Travis injury come from America to Europe.
Together with this vectorscope reduce italos.

But promise injury is not present in America, and since now we know that other several other species are also affected with from century, we assume that for Ascendere was present in Europe before Skype, windows Titanus come.
But the problems on the grapes started when this Victor come from American.

So a short conclusion for this first part of my talk is that in Slovenia we have several different genetic strengths of Robinson, Dorian, Brown or Phytoplasma, which are presumably linked to different Epidemiology, and therefore we need different control measures.
It is not easy to detect fighter plasmas.
Becausw fighter plasmas are really small by the size.
They have reduced genome and therefore it's not possible to culture phytoplasma on cell free media.
What means that the traditional diagnostic methods which are suitable for bacteria cannot be used for detection of fighter plasmas.
Then for the plasmas are unevenly distributed in affected plants.
Where they usually present in very low concentrations.
And in addition, the variation the tighter according to the season and plant organs was absurd.
Moreover, one of the Grapevine yellows phytoplasma from Sindri is listed on Correntina list for European Union.
What mean the destruction of disease and surrounding plant is mandatory?
An from all of this, it is obvious that we need to reliable sensitive and fast diagnostic procedure.
In our laboratory we developed and we use diagnostic procedure which is composed of a simple and quick conversation step.
Then then extraction is based on the binding of denata magnetic bits and then finally for detection you have real time PCR or real time PCR method is accreditated according to Isaiah 17 oh 25.
With this diagnostic procedure, we can analyze more than 20 sample in approximately one day, while in the past for such analyzes we needed five days.
In addition, with this diagnostic procedure, we can get less contamination that says possibility to get the contamination and real time PCR which is used now.
It's much more sensitive than conventional PCR which was used in the past.
In most cases, testing for fighter plasmas provides or can be interpreted as quality information.

But in some cases, quantitative information are necessary, for example, for monitoring fighter plasma kinetics such as the progress of infection and variation of the phytoplasma title from the season and the different plant issue, which is important information for efficient planning of sampling.
Qualification is also important, for example, for screening plans for resistance against Phytoplasma and for example, to estimate the number of copies carried by the victors.
Usually for quantification you use real time PCR.
To get a quantitative data with real time PCR, real time PCR requires a composition of unknown sample to a standard.
But unfortunately in the field of Phytoplasma we do not have any certificate reference material.
Therefore, to prepare a standard curve, we need have to add illusions of a sample that contained the target DNA sequence or a sample with non copy number of plasmids.
But now we get in the new method digital PCR.
With this, with this method we can get the absolute quantification of the target sequence without relying on the use of standard course.
One example of digital PCR is droplet digital digital PCR or shortly D. PCR.
Digital PCR works like real time PCR.
It.
One big difference is what is that it first particular sample into hundreds or even thousands of reaction chambers in case of Droplet digital PCR droplets.
More details and one example how to use digital PCR is presented on the poster which was prepared by Tonya Dreyer and other colleagues.
In our laboratory we were the first who developed digital PCR for absolute configuration of fighter plasmas.
We simply transfer real time PCR to DD DD PCR format and for that we use the same primers and probes.
Therefore the specificity of DD PCR is the same As for real time PCR.
We also confirm that also the sensitivity of the PCR is similar as it is for real time PCR.
But did it PCR?
Can do more precise and more.
It is more reputable for quantification of ascendere phytoplasma at the low concentration.

In last few years in our laboratory, we are also focused on developing our methods that can be used for on site detection, and we found that such method and that lamp can be used for that lamp is loop mediated is automatic application.
It is a fast multiplication of DNA target at one tube in one tube.
It is optimal conditions what means that we do not need any big and expensive equipment.
For application with land we need 4 to 6 primers.
And then after the application we can detect lamb products by different principles.
In our laboratory, we choose a method where we measure of resistance in real time.
For that we need to add to direction integrating die and we need to have a simple device which is hit or an full emitter at the same time.
In this up in this principle, we can easily read I do the sample is positive or not.
If you see the rise of the floral scent, that means that the sample is positive.
Is there is no right of the 1st and the sample is negative.
And in addition, at the end, we can also check our results because the metric temperature of the final product is, but again specific.
We only developed lamp assay for detection of lava, sand or a part of plasma and for one of our plasma is at the final stage.
And how to perform lamp on site?
For example in vineyards?
First we have to take an appropriate part of the sample.
Then this sample should be homogenised either by manually shaking in the tube or with a simple homogenizer.
And because lamp is not sensitive to the inhibitors, there is no need for their next action.
We just simply mix a sample with lamprey against and then this mix is transferred to the device for amplification and detection.
And we clamp it, could gather results very quick in approximately 14 minutes.
We developed different assists of different principle of lamps, for example either with or without their new extraction.
And this all those lamp have been fully validated, according to a post standard.
I must say that lamp is a little bit little bit less sensitive than real time PCR.
For example, lamp for for cindery phytoplasma is 9 times less sensitive than real time PCR.
So the conclusions for my second part of the talk is that in our laboratory we developed and we use relatively quick diagnostic procedure and this diagnostic procedure is very sensitive.

Then we developed DD PCR for absolute quantification of ascendere phytoplasma without the need of any calibrant and this DD PCR has the potential to be used to characterize phytoplasma reference material.
Or for quantification and quality control of DNA based on how small reference materials that is typically used in diagnostics and methodological laboratories.
We also developed lamp assay that can be used for on-site detection where we do not need any expensive equipment and nucleotide distraction is not need to be done.
In addition to what I presented today in our liberal in our Institute, we are also working on enter interaction.
We also studied the interaction between Phytoplasma San Gray pants.
Mainly we are focused to the gene expression in infected hosts.
We are focused to the host transcriptome and metabolome levels with emphasis on the host.

Carbohydrate metabolism which is presumably affected by the fight of phytoplasma infection and then we used by formatics approaches for searching of new markers for early detection of grape on yellow so that we can detect the cytoplasm.
As before, the formation of the symptoms.
The work that I present today was financed by several different project European project.
We dispense then by Slovenian search agency by two different of risk of project graph DP and grabbed Epic two.
I must mention that graph DP was financed by the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Foot of Sauvignon.
And then the monitoring of Grapevine yellows phytoplasma is lead by the Slovenia fetus and it added ministration and thank you for your attention.
